text: Lakeside Union School District is a Kindergarten - 8th grade public school district in Bakersfield, California. The district has 2 schools, and serves Southwest Bakersfield.Home Page. Lakeside Union School District. Accessed: 03-23-2011. ==References== ==External links== *Lakeside Union School District Category:School districts in Kern County, California Category:Educational institutions established in 1941
title: Lakeside Union School District (Bakersfield)
